title: OPL Split 2 Week 5 Results
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/opl_split_1_announce.jpg?itok=aX-Y1qp7

Hey guys,

Week 5 has come to a close and unfortunately last week no one managed to pick all 8 games correctly! 

Dire Wolves vs Legacy was the biggest upset with 68.8% of players picking the Dire Wolves win.

replies.body:
Hey I don't have a good solution for that at the moment. But below are your picks. If a lot of people want to know what they guessed every week I will look into finding a solution that scales better.

20/06/2015 21:39:04	Kenjishin	  Avant Garde 	Chiefs	Dire Wolves	Legacy	Sin Gaming	Absolute	Dire Wolves	Chiefs

Hi Maraudaur,

Thanks for the reply, didn't expect Google doesn't provide a convenient solution for us to check what had we actually pick.
I can definitely just share the results spreadsheet, but at this point I don't want to make everyone's picks public.
